TempStable 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • my-vignette
  • Changelog

    Function to generate random variates of the TSS distribution.

    rTSS.Rd

    Generates n random numbers distributed according of the tempered stable subordinator distribution.

    rTSS(
  n,
  alpha = NULL,
  delta = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  theta = NULL,
  methodR = "AR",
  k = 10000
)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size (integer).

    alpha

    Stability parameter. A real number between 0 and 1.

    delta

    Scale parameter. A real number > 0.

    lambda

    Tempering parameter. A real number > 0.

    theta

    Parameters stacked as a vector.

    methodR

    A String. Either "AR" or "SR".

    k

    integer: the level of truncation, if methodR == "SR". 10000 by default.

    Value

    Generates n random numbers.

    Details

    theta denotes the parameter vector (alpha, delta, lambda). Either provide the parameters alpha, delta, lambda individually OR provide theta. "AR" stands for the Acceptance-Rejection Method and "SR" for a truncated infinite shot noise series representation. "AR" is the standard method used. For more details, see references.

    References

    Massing, Till (2022), 'Parametric Estimation of Tempered Stable Laws'

    Kawai, R & Masuda, H (2011), 'On simulation of tempered stable random variates' doi:10.1016/j.cam.2010.12.014

    Examples

    rTSS(100,0.5,1,1)
#>   [1] 2.0363673 5.1150451 0.9563463 0.7644210 2.3547096 1.2814746 4.1696949
#>   [8] 2.3136563 2.2649104 1.6972174 1.1259181 1.5701278 1.5740003 1.3983354
#>  [15] 1.0225786 1.1117760 2.4072141 1.2390590 2.4351540 1.5461451 1.4502372
#>  [22] 2.7539457 2.0711859 1.4026413 1.0567657 3.4874146 1.2254821 2.8137614
#>  [29] 2.4697923 1.9585292 2.2615981 2.6006709 1.8975043 2.2044178 1.7850773
#>  [36] 0.8675857 2.1481535 1.5546694 1.8000522 2.9555562 0.9762566 2.8580272
#>  [43] 1.6680197 0.7994765 2.3786442 2.2623827 1.4499651 2.0993855 3.5819988
#>  [50] 0.6807093 0.8971232 1.6104360 1.1237487 1.0274414 1.9794621 0.6079061
#>  [57] 1.5738203 0.8233529 2.1743005 1.0497219 1.6117037 2.1333783 1.5276908
#>  [64] 1.7954776 1.9287823 2.1122639 2.3643555 1.0540583 0.8250562 2.4199151
#>  [71] 1.4293052 0.7431755 1.9479194 0.8221491 0.8389079 0.6657993 4.9931133

#>  [92] 1.8440102 2.1356447 1.8877571 1.3631626 3.2586187 2.2830186 2.2367304
